paper.title: Research on the Stock Price Prediction and Portfolio Optimization Strategy Based on Regression Analysis
paper.abstract: This paper mainly analyzed stock price prediction and portfolio optimization strategy based on regression analysis. It is studied based on fuzzy decision theory with proportional to the cost of trading of securities portfolio optimization problem. First of all, based on absolute deviation risk function and minimax principle this paper proposes a new risk function to minimax the half absolute deviation risk function; Then, we introduced a kind of nonlinear membership function more vividly describes the investors' investment income and satisfaction with the degree of the investment risk. On this basis, we further put forward the fuzzy decision satisfaction with nonlinear portfolio selection model. In the final part, we numerically simulate the proposed methodology, the result proves the feasibility.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究基于回归分析的股票价格预测和投资组合优化策略，提出了模糊决策满意度的非线性投资组合选择模型，并通过数值模拟验证了其可行性。这些内容明确指向投资组合管理领域。
